channel.title: Posts on Hugh's Curriculum Vitae
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hugh's Curriculum Vitae

item.title: Tone in Whispered Speech Bibliography
item.description: This is a short non-exhaustive bibliography of instigations and their reports when looking at tone in whispered speech. Citations are kept in a GitHub gist. Comments are welcome via GitHub.

item.title: Bibliography of select Philippine language descriptions
item.description: This is a short non-exhaustive bibliography of phonological descriptions of Philippine languages. Citations are kept in a GitHub gist. Comments are welcome via GitHub.

item.title: TEI Lexicon Bibliography
item.description: This is a short non-exhaustive bibliography of lexicon projects which have tested or opted to use the XML TEI format for their data. Citations are kept in a GitHub gist. Comments are welcome via GitHub.

item.title: Academic resources for Ethno-arts in Nigeria
item.description: This post is a quick review of the literature before a general language documentation project in Northern Nigeria. Notable Authors Dr Amanda Villepastour Vicki Brennan 2013. “Up Above the River Jordan”: Hymns and Historical Consciousness in the Cherubim and Seraphim Churches of Nigeria. Studies in World Christianity 19 (1): 31-49 2012. Take Control: The Labor of Immediacy in Yoruba Christian Music. Journal of Popular Music Studies 24 (4): 411-429.

item.title: Lexical Database Archiving Questionnaire
item.description:
I am asking around on different mailing lists to gain some insight into the archiving habits of linguists who use lexical databases. I am specifically interested in databases created by tools like FLEx, ToolBox, Lexus, TshwaneLex, etc.

Background Story
